DOC.brief_summary: ABSTRACT Introduction : In addition pain cause uterine contraction labour , 33 % woman , continuous severe back pain observe . In management pain , sterile water injection consider effective method . Aim study assessment effectiveness satisfaction method among Turkish woman analgesic method extensively use labour rate cesarean section exponentially increase . Material Methods : 168 term , healthy woman admit Istanbul Gaziosmanpaşa-Taksim Training Research Hospital labour pain severe back pain randomized 4x0.1 ml sterile water 4xdry Injection group . Injections apply Michaelis Rhomboid region sacral region . Pain score assess 10th , 30th , 60th , 120th 180th minute Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) . Additionally , need epidural analgesia , APGAR score , mode delivery , time delivery , maternal satisfaction breastfeeding score assess .
DOC.brief_title: Sterile Water Injections For Pain Relief İn Labor
DOC.criteria: Aged 1835 3742 week gestation Expecting vaginal delivery Cephalic presentation Single , healthy fetus Spontaneous onset labor Active phase first stage labor ( 37 cm cervical dilatation ) Severe low back pain ( VAS > 7cm ) Required pain relief Gestation < 37 week Multiple pregnancy Malpresentation Second stage labour Pharmacological analgesia prior SWI Back pain assess VAS < 7 Women whose labour would consider high risk
